Name: Threesome
Ingredients: 45 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: Why stop at three when you can have a foursome? An interesting meld of apple, orange, anise and pineapple.
History: Adapted from a drink discovered in 2002 at Circus Bar, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Threesome contains 250 calories
